connect.desired-wallet: Click on the wallet below and let us know which one you need more
connect.footer: We do not own your private keys and cannot access your assets without your confirmation.
connect.imtoken-reject: You have declined authorization, please refresh this page to authorize again.
connect.wechat: The current environment does not support metamask. You can connect Metamask in the browser.

auth.desc: Skip approving every interaction with your wallet by allowing Mail3 to remember you.
auth.sign: I authorize sending and checking my emails on mail3 from this device. This doesn't cost anything.

errors.wallet-not-connected: Wallet is not connected, please connect your wallet
errors.unknown: Unknown error, please try again later
errors.condition-not-meet: You do not have permission to participate in Beta testing.
